title: Ep 12: Big Barber
description:
Today's Proceedings: A boyfriend jealous of fiance's co-worker, a man mistakes a party invite, and a girlfriend destroys her boyfriends self confidence.  We also try to wake up the masses to the truth that is going on around us at all times.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod

Music by: James Young

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg
